text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Thank you, Your level of intelligence and knowledge shows.  Suggestion- how about you help your local hospitals and support their fight against Covid-19 and get them the PPE and Equipment they need.  Leave politics to the grownups.
